mapper.select: select id, project_id as projectId, school_id as schoolId, create_user_id as createUserId, ranks, status, captain, instructor, contestants from db_signup where id = ${value}
mapper.insert: insert into db_signup (project_id, school_id, create_user_id, ranks, captain, instructor, contestants, people_num, program_name, program_eng_name, participating_account, phone_num, company) values (#{projectId}, #{schoolId}, #{createUserId}, #{ranks}, #{captain}, #{instructor}, #{contestants}, #{peopleNum}, #{programName}, #{programEngName}, #{participatingAccount}, #{phoneNum}, #{company});
mapper.update: update db_signup set project_id=#{projectId}, school_id=#{schoolId}, create_user_id=#{createUserId}, ranks=#{ranks}, captain=#{captain}, instructor=#{instructor}, contestants=#{contestants} where id = #{id}
